comments.name: remarks
comments.value: Checks whether an item stack has a given enchantment type.

comments.name: param
comments.value: The enchantment type to check for.

comments.name: returns
comments.value: Returns true if the item stack has the enchantment type.

comments.name: throws
comments.value: ScriptItemEnchantmentUnknownIdError: Exception thrown if the enchantment type does not exist.
